Our Services

Day-to-Day Bookkeeping

As a business owner, your time is valuable. Instead of spending your time keeping your books up to date, let us do it for you. If you have the day-to-day handled, but want an extra set of eyes to make sure everything looks good, we do quarterly and annual file reviews.

We can assist you with entering expenses, ensuring bill payments to vendors are initiated on time, and invoicing your customers.

We can help you learn how to use your accounting system through customized training.

I want bookkeeping!

Cloud-Based Accounting

Having your accounting system in the cloud means that your data is available to you, anytime, anywhere. You can work at the same time as us. And there's no need to worry about the last time your file was backed up, because the cloud provider handles back ups for you.

We are advanced certified QuickBooks ProAdvisors, which means that we can help convert your existing system to QuickBooks Online, and advise you on the best apps to add on to your system.

Take me to the cloud!

Monthly Reporting

Accounting data can provide valuable information to help you make decisions about your business.

We can help you set up your accounting system to produce customized reports that help you focus on your business goals. We start by getting a full understanding of your business model and goals, and use that to build a system from the chart of accounts on up that gives you the information you need to make better decisions.

We teach you how to use your financial information through clear and concise customized training.

Show me some charts!

Internal Controls

Internal controls help protect your financial accounts from errors or worse, fraud.

Having systems in place protects you and your employees from external threats, errors, and confusion.

Documenting your system keeps business running smoothly and makes it easy to train new employees.

Formalize my system!

About

Hello! I'm Kelly-Ann Green. I am a Certified Public Accountant with experience in tax, audit, and small business financial accounting and reporting.

I love to work with clients who are seeking to understand their financial situation, even if they don't want to handle the details themselves. I enjoy finding ways to reduce your workload by using accounting software to its fullest capabilities.

You can find more information about me and my background on LinkedIn.
